actions.name: Wind Power

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a [Wind] attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a [Wind] attack.
Effect: The user's next Electric-Type attack has double Power.

actions.name: Wind Power
actions.description: Passive: While Windy Weather is active, the user's Electric-Type attacks have double Power. The trigger effect of this ability cannot be activated if the user is utilizing the Passive effect.

system.description:

Effect: The user's next Electric-Type attack has double Power. Passive: While Windy Weather is active, the user's Electric-Type attacks have double Power. The trigger effect of this ability cannot be activated if the user is utilizing the Passive effect.
